name: Les Sons Imaginaires (gunner2)
description:
Les Sons Imaginaires is a puzzle-adventure game with 2D sprites set in a 3D world. This world shrunk many years ago, leading to an unexpected consequence:  all of  the world's sound was lost.  It is now up to you to restore all sound to this small world.

Made during Weekly Game Jam #40 themed:  "Small World"

Programming / Unity:   Josh Gunn - gunner2.itch.io/

Environment artist, UI graphics:  Nielisson Mendonça - nielisson.eu/

Music:  Gerry Brazell (Dobi) - soundcloud.com/gerry-brazell

Graphics (general):  Thomson P-T  -  https://www.behance.net/mythrilmanc780   https://twitter.com/MythrilMan51

Sound:   Scowsh -   https://soundcloud.com/scowsh  https://twitter.com/scowshmolosh 

Character Design:   Winter
